name: roq/fix/MassCancelRequestType
comment: Specifies scope of Order Mass Cancel Request <q>

values.name: CancelOrdersForUnderlyingSecurity
values.comment: Cancel orders for an underlying security

values.name: CancelOrdersForTradingSession
values.comment: Cancel orders for a trading session

values.name: CancelForMarketSegment
values.comment: Cancel orders for a market segment

values.name: CancelForSecurityGroup
values.comment: Cancel orders for a security group

values.name: CancelForUnderlyingSecurity
values.comment: Cancel for Issuer of Underlying Security
